entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of wet snow. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of wet snow late this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 21 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023
